oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mary Mildred Jones correspondence with Thomas R. Jones, Sr., undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jones, Mary Mildred
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Mary Mildred Jones to her husband, Tommy Jones, in which she discusses her concerns for his safety, and his location. She discusses his basic training activities as well as her daily activities.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Soldiers -- United States -- 20th century -- History; World War, 1939-1945
Jones, Mary Mildred; Jones, Thomas R., Sr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. World War II correspondence
